thread.title: Boca Juniors close to win Argentine league
thread.title_full: Boca Juniors close to win Argentine league

author: NewsWire
title: Boca Juniors close to win Argentine league
text: Added on October 5, 2015 NewsWire Boca Juniors close to win Argentine league 0 0 0 0 0 Buenos Aires, Oct 6 (IANS) Boca Juniors defeated Crucero del Norte 1-0 in Argentina’s local tournament and is now close to become champion, local press reported on Monday. Carlos Tevez, who failed at a penalty at the seventh minute, scored the winner four minutes later, Xinhua news agency reported. Boca Juniors have gathered 61 points, six more than second-placed San Lorenzo, just three matchdays before the end of the tournament.
